page.title: 09TOURISM (MUSEUM)
page.content: THE {HUNDAY TRACTOR AND FARMING MUSEUM WAS OPENED IN {1979 }BY {HRH QUEEN {ELIZABETH THE QUEEN MOTHER.}SINCE THEN {40,000 }VISITORS HAVE PAID TO GO IN. THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 50 TRACTORS ON DISPLAY,DATING BACK TO THE TURN OF THE CENTURY.THESE HAVE BEEN GATHERED FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD,MANY BEING BADLY NEGLECTED AND IN DISREPAIR,BUT ALL HAVE BEEN LOVINGLY RESTORED.THERE ARE ALSO OLD CARS,A FIRE ENGINE AND VEHICLES ONCE USED BY LOCAL TRADES_ MEN.UPSTAIRS IS A FASCINATING DISPLAY OF OLD FARM IMPLEMENTS WITH PICTURES ILLUSTRATING THEIR USE,SOME QUITE GRUSOME.THIS LEADS INTO A DISPLAY OF FARMHOUSE LIFE,SHOWING A TYPICAL KITCHEN,LIVING ROOM AND DAIRY OF THE TURN OF THE CENTURY.THE ENTRANCE TO HUNDAY IS THROUGH A {GIN_GAN,}IN THE PAST A HORSE OR MULE WOULD WALK AROUND INSIDE THIS TO TURN A GRIND STONE.
